item.title: Programming as a Passion vs Programming as a Job
item.description: Based on my experiences with my personal opinion and thought When we were still in college, we always demanded for studying hard. Having a good score in every class and also active in social community, club or something. I remember when I was still in college, I always trying not to fail in my class. Also, I’m joining a club, a community by students. A geek one, it’s called “Programming Club”.

item.title: Faker
item.description: Struct Data Fake Generator Faker will generate you a fake data based on your Struct. Source code: github Support Getting Started Example Contribution Support You can file an Issue. See documentation in Godoc Getting Started Download go get -u github.com/bxcodec/faker Example With Tag Supported tag: Internet : Email Mac address Domain name Url UserName IP Address (IPV4 IPV6 ) Password Payment : Credit Card Type (VISA, MASTERCARD , AMERICAN EXPRESS ,DISCOVER) Credit Card Number Address :
